text: madyan nivāsikaḷilēkk avaruṭe sahēādaran śu'aibine nāṁ niyēāgiccu. addēhaṁ paṟaññu: "enṟe janamē, niṅṅaḷ allāhuvin vaḻippeṭuka. avanallāte niṅṅaḷkkeāru daivamilla. niṅṅaḷ aḷaviluṁ tūkkattiluṁ kuṟavu varuttarut. ñān niṅṅaḷe kāṇunnat susthitiyilāṇ. atēāṭeāppaṁ niṅṅaḷeyāke valayaṁ ceyyunna śikṣa niṅṅaḷkkuṇṭākumēāyenn ñān bhayappeṭukayuṁ ceyyunnu
